attributes.action: Ban the creation and distribution firearms with 3d printers
attributes.additional_details: The government must take action to prevent the creation, and distribution of files related to the 3D printing of firearms. A number of digital documents have already circulated the internet which allow the direct creation of firearms with a 3D printing device. This poses a direct threat to public safety and also creates a new risk of terrorism. The creation, and distribution of these files must be made illegal.
